alert.note: Alert for Adair; Madison; Union (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 8:59AM CDT until July 17 at 9:45AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Madison County in south central Iowa... Northern Union County in south central Iowa... Southern Adair County in southwestern Iowa... * Until 945 AM CDT. * At 858 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Nodaway Park, or 5 miles southwest of Greenfield, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Orient around 905 AM CDT. Green Valley Lake and Green Valley Lake State Park around 910 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Macksburg, Lorimor and Thayer. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
